attributes.action: 30 hours free childcare should be brought forward as early as September 2023
attributes.additional_details: The cost of childcare is high as well as cost of living coupled with inflation. The general increment of salaries does not match inflation. There is essentially a dyer need for government to implement 30 hours free childcare for children between 9 months to 5 years with immediate effect as opposed to stalling it to 2024/2025.
attributes.background:
Why wait till 2024/2025? Inflation and the impact of the astronomical cost of living is happening now, families are feeling the heat.

The enforcement of 30 hours free childcare for children between 9 months to 5 years should be implemented as early as September 2023. Government needs to act now.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634909
